attributes.action: COMPLAINT  PETITION TO  OUR UK FCO AND HOME OFFICE REJECTED MY CASE
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
DEAR MR.PRIME MINISTER ARE GORDON BROWN IN UK OR GB:FOR DETAILS WILL BE GIVEN IN WHICH ALL RELATED FILES HAS BEEN LISTED IN BELOWS ONLY FOR OR ON MY CASE OR MATTER STATED IN ABOVE ARE
1-FCO REF:BCN/13264/1979,
2-UKPA REF:UKP/3438/1990,
3-UK HOME OFFICE REF:C-323151 AND 4-UK HOME OFFICE REF:CM 15290 SOLVED OR REPLIED MY CASE OR MATTER WITHOUT ANY KIND OF RACES OR SKINS OR BORNED PLACES OR LIVED PLACES PURPOSED TO CANCELLED OR CLOSED OR REFUSED ALL BASIC RIGHTS UNDER MOST DISCRIMINATED CONDITIONS OR POSITIONS OR MANNERS OR MEANS BY YOU YET?????!!!!!
YOUR SINCERELY,
CHAN YIU BING FREDERICK 
DATED AT:22TH,JAN,2010.

rejection.details: As an individual case this should be directed to the Home Office.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
